en.success: Please check your inbox to finish your registration.

en.registration_email_error: An error occurred while resending your registration email.

fr.title_free_trial: Commencez votre essai gratuit de 30 jours

nl.success: Controleer uw inbox om uw registratie te voltooien.

ja.got_account: すでにアカウントをお持ちですか？
